newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee weakens vs dollar and stg.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee weakens vs dollar and stg.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee weakened against both dollar and sterling on Friday reflecting international market trends, foreign exchange dealers said.
The rupee was fixed at a commercial mean rate of 20.7975 to the dollar from 20.7675 on Thursday, and at 34.6775 to the sterling from 34.578.
Forex dealers said the central bank sold dollars on the forex interbank market on Thursday mid afternoon at the prevailing interbank rate.
They added that even with central bank intervention, some commercial banks were still short of hard currency.
